timeline.message: Reverting to a standard toString until it is shown to modify the end goal

timeline.bodyText: Why are we passing in the campaign date when we're already passing in the campaign?
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText:
Personal stylistic choice, I've never been much of a fan of overloaded methods and would rather add more parameters.
Additionally, we now require both the campaign and the date, plus it is not guaranteed that the date will be the campaign date.
replies.author: Windchild292
